attributes.action: Better pay for healthworkers amid coronavirus outbreak
attributes.additional_details: Doctors and healthworkers are risking their lives to treat patients. They also have families who are at risk due to this. They are unlikely to take time off due to the nature of the work.
attributes.background: Please increase the pay for doctors and health workers

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073.
